title: MD
biography: Jan Evangelista Purkyně was a Czech anatomist and physiologist. In 1839, he coined the term "protoplasma" for the fluid substance of a cell. He was one of the best known scientists of his time. Such was his fame that when people from outside Europe wrote letters to him, all that they needed to put as the address was "Purkyně, Europe".
aiSummary: Jan Evangelista PurkyněCharles University is a national medical honors specialist with an H-index of 3 at Physiology (Member). Has been published in The International journal of neuroscience, Advanced science (Weinheim, Baden-Wurttemberg, Germany), Journal of medical imaging and radiation sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
